Posts.EditableText: I have noticed in the point and click QDK editor that it sometimes changes the carefully typed in mixed case of objects and properties to all lower case. It seem Quest is not case sensative, but when my "SpaceSuitO2Level" changes to "spacesuito2level" in a drop down list, its awkward. It would be nice if QDK maintaint the original mixed case names of things that were typed in.
